mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT VIEW_NAME FROM USER_VIEWS UNION SELECT TABLE_NAME VIEW_NAME FROM USER_TABLES) WHERE VIEW_NAME = UPPER(#{viewName})
SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LENGTH, DATA_PRECISION, DATA_SCALE, NULLABLE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = UPPER(#{viewName}) AND A.COLUMN_NAME = UPPER(#{colName})

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_TABLES WHERE 1 = 1
AND TABLE_NAME = UPPER(#{tableName})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = UPPER(#{seqName})
mapper.update: MERGE INTO ${tableName} A USING (SELECT ${selectStr} ,SYSDATE CJSJ FROM DUAL) B ON (${onStr}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ${setStr},A.CJSJ = B.CJSJ WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (${insertStr},A.CJSJ) VALUES (${valuesStr},B.CJSJ)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_COMMON_LOG_INFO (IP_ADDRESS, URI_PATH, URL_PATH, METHOD, PARAM_FOLLOW, PARAM_ALL) VALUES (#{ip_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uri_path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url_path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param_follow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param_all,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
